mapper.insert: INSERT INTO af_production_feature ( production_type, operator_id, action_time ) VALUES ( #{production_type}, #{operator_id}, #{action_time} )
mapper.update: UPDATE af_production_feature SET finish_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key}
mapper.select: SELECT af_pf_key, production_type, operator_id, action_time, finish_time FROM af_production_feature WHERE operator_id = #{operator_id} AND finish_time IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE af_production_feature SET finish_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE operator_id = #{operator_id} AND finish_time IS NULL;
mapper.select: SELECT af_pf_key, production_type, operator_id, action_time, finish_time FROM af_production_feature WHERE production_type = #{production_type} AND finish_time IS NULL

SELECT count(material_id) as cnt, division FROM ( SELECT pospf.material_id,
0 as division
CASE WHEN (mdl.kind = 7) THEN 1 WHEN (mdl.kind = 8) THEN 2 WHEN (mdl.kind = 9) THEN 3 ELSE 0 END as division
CASE WHEN pospf.pcs_inputs like '%manual%' THEN 0 WHEN (mdl.kind = 7) THEN 2 WHEN (mdl.kind = 8) THEN 3 WHEN (mdl.kind = 9) THEN 4 ELSE 1 END as division
FROM af_production_feature afpf JOIN production_feature pospf on afpf.operator_id = pospf.operator_id and pospf.operate_result = #{operate_result} and pospf.position_id = #{position_id}
JOIN material ma on pospf.material_id = ma.material_id
and ma.fix_type in (1, 2)
and ma.fix_type = 3
join v_model mdl on ma.model_id = mdl.model_id
where af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} and pospf.finish_time >= afpf.action_time and (afpf.finish_time IS NULL OR pospf.finish_time <= afpf.finish_time) ) vset group by division ;
select shelf_cost as division, quantity as cnt from fact_consumable_warehouse fcw where af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} ;

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM steel_wire_container_wash_process WHERE process_type = #{process_type} AND process_time BETWEEN (SELECT action_time FROM af_production_feature WHERE af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key}) AND (SELECT COALESCE(finish_time, '2999-01-01') FROM af_production_feature WHERE af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key})

select ns_count as division, count(1) as cnt from ( select ma.material_id, (count(pos.line_id = 13) * (level != 1) > 0) as ns_count from fact_partial_release fpr JOIN material ma ON fpr.material_id = ma.material_id JOIN v_model mdl ON ma.model_id = mdl.model_id JOIN process_assign_template pat ON COALESCE(ma.pat_id, mdl.default_pat_id) = pat.process_assign_template_id JOIN process_assign pa ON pat.process_assign_template_id = pa.refer_id and pa.refer_type = 1 JOIN position pos on pa.position_id = pos.position_id WHERE fpr.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} AND level not in (9, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99) GROUP BY ma.material_id ) tmp GROUP by ns_count ;

select ns_count as division, count(1) as cnt from ( select ma.material_id, (pos.line_id = 13) as ns_count from fact_partial_release fpr JOIN material ma ON fpr.material_id = ma.material_id JOIN material_process_assign pa ON ma.material_id = pa.material_id JOIN position pos on pa.position_id = pos.position_id WHERE fpr.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} AND prev_position_id = 0 AND level in (9, 91, 92, 93, 94, 95, 96, 97, 98, 99) GROUP BY ma.material_id ) tmp GROUP by ns_count ;
select sum(quantity) as cnt from fact_partial_release fpr where fpr.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} ;
